data.meanings: to come back from, repent, set (stars), repeat, return (from disobedience to obedience), echo, alight at night.
data.sentence: The word مَءَابًا comes from the root ا و ب and is associated with the meanings: to come back from, repent, set (stars), repeat, return (from disobedience to obedience), echo, alight at night.
